first_tick_commands: execute as @s[tag=satsu.iron.man.enable.armor,scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=1}] run tag @s remove sentinel.false
execute as @s[tag=!satsu.iron.man.enable.armor,scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=1}] run tag @s remove sentinel.false

conditions.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

enabling.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0.1..0.5] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

conditions.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID
